text.value:
CREATE TABLE @{variables('archive_table_name')}(
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    team VARCHAR(100),
    score BIGINT,
    matches_played INT,
    last_updated DATETIME2
);

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM @{item().tableSchemaName}.@{item().tableName}
WHERE @{item().Watermark_Column} > '@{formatDateTime(startOfDay(addDays(coalesce(pipeline().parameters.input_date, startOfDay(utcNow())), -7)), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}' AND @{item().Watermark_Column} <= '@{formatDateTime(coalesce(concat(pipeline().parameters.input_date, 'T23:59:59'), utcNow()), 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}'

preCopyScript.value:
DELETE FROM @{item().tableSchemaName}.@{item().tableName}
WHERE CAST(@{item().Watermark_Column} AS DATE) > '@{formatDateTime(addDays(coalesce(pipeline().parameters.input_date, utcNow()), -7), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}' AND CAST(@{item().Watermark_Column} AS DATE) <= '@{formatDateTime(coalesce(pipeline().parameters.input_date, utcNow()), 'yyyy-MM-dd')}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select refreshStatus as status from master_load_status_tracker
where tablename = 'salesitems';

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT * FROM @{item().tableSchemaName}.@{item().tableName}
WHERE @{item().Watermark_Column} >= '@{formatDateTime(activity('Get Old Watermark Value').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue,'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}' AND @{item().Watermark_Column} <= '@{formatDateTime(activity('Get New Watermark Value').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkValue,'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}'

SELECT CASE WHEN WatermarkValue <= '@{formatDateTime(startOfDay(getPastTime(2, 'Month')), 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}'
THEN WatermarkValue
ELSE '@{formatDateTime(startOfDay(getPastTime(2, 'Month')), 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss')}'
END AS WatermarkValue
FROM dbo.watermarktable
WHERE SchemaName = '@{item().tableSchemaName}'
AND TableName = '@{item().tableName}';

activities.name: Get Old Watermark Value
activities.description: Get old watermark value from dbo.watermarktable table

activities.name: Get New Watermark Value
activities.description: Get new watermark value from table which have to be copied
